Part 0 - Program Design

Axioms

Specificity of adaptation Weakest link theory (+ each sport stresses links differently, so want to profile accordingly) Training = Stress and recover Training is the process of applying calculated stress to the body and providing the conditions necessary to adapt. In short, training consists of stress and recovery. The applied stress evokes a specific adaptation, and when training for a goal, it is important to know what physiological systems you want to stress and consequently improve.

Each successive level will investigate one link in the chain and ways to optimize
